items.question: Which version of EA FC will be used?
items.answer: EA Sports FC 24, the most recent version, with all official teams updated.

items.question: What do I need to bring to the tournament?
items.answer: Only your ID or identification document. We provide consoles, monitors, and controllers.

items.question: Can I use my own controller?
items.answer: Yes, you can bring your own PS5 controller if you prefer. Make sure it's charged.

items.question: Is there a minimum age to participate?
items.answer: Minimum age is 14. Minors under 18 need parental authorization.

items.question: What if I'm late?
items.answer: Registration closes at 11:30 AM. Arriving later may result in disqualification.

items.question: Can I bring guests?
items.answer: Yes, each participant can bring up to 2 guests. Access is free for them.

items.question: How is the registration fee paid?
items.answer: By bank transfer or in cash on the event day (only if spots remain).

items.question: Is there a refund if I cannot attend?
items.answer: 100% refund up to 48 hours before. No refunds after that.
